name: robo-tea: Misten Minicups!
description:
Here is where all the mini-cups of the marvelous muses, Misten, are!

Misten is a band from my robo-tea game series. Their home is on the planet Velostar, and their major inspiration are animated shows! These minicups (minigames) are small sneak peeks into their lives.

Please enjoy the minigames whenever they are released. Each game ideally will be around 10 minutes of gameplay, with linear storyline.

04-06-2017 - Misten Minicup 1 is released! You are part of a band, Misten, and prepare for a trip to the neighbouring planet, Verdande! In the robo-tea timeline, this small visual novel happens at the same time as the robo-tea:2ndServing demo!
Feel free to letsplay it! Or both this and the demo in the same video!

Check back for more small cups of Misten! *w*

If you'd like me to see your reaction on twitter, please use the tags #robotea or #roboteaMM
